bio: I have studied Computer Science at the Universita' degli Studi di Udine receiving my B.Sc. in 2013. In 2015, I have got my M.Sc. degree with 110/110 cum laude in the joint program between the Universita' degli Studi di Udine and the Alpen-Adria-Universität Klagenfurt. Currently, I am a PhD student in the Software Engineering Research Group for the Alpen-Adria-Universität Klagenfurt supervised by Prof. Martin Pinzger. In 2017, I was the vice-chair of the IEEE Student Branch Austria for the Klagenfurt section.
news: Our paper Automatic Repair of Timestamp Comparisons has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering.
